Trampoline Dodgeball - This new sport combines elements of dodgeball and trampolining. Players would bounce around a court on trampolines while trying to eliminate their opponents by hitting them with a ball. Confidence Score: 0.8

AquaSphere - A sport that takes place entirely underwater, where players must navigate through a large sphere filled with obstacles and opponents. Players would use specialized gear that allows them to breathe and move around easily in the water. Confidence Score: 0.9

CyberSphere - A futuristic sport that combines elements of basketball, martial arts, and virtual reality. Players would wear special suits that track their movements and project their avatars onto a virtual court, where they would compete against other players in a high-tech arena. Confidence Score: 0.95

SkyVolley - A variation of volleyball played on a vertical court with trampolines at each end. Players would use the trampolines to launch themselves into the air and spike the ball over the net, adding an extra level of excitement and difficulty to the game. Confidence Score: 0.85

SonicSprint - A high-speed sport that combines elements of track and field and video games. Players would run on a track with obstacles and challenges inspired by popular video games, such as hurdles, pitfalls, and power-ups. The goal is to be the first player to cross the finish line and win the race. Confidence Score: 0.9
